name: Mismagius

passive.name: Vengeful Spirits
passive.effect: Whenever a Pokemon is Knocked Out, add 6 damage counters as spread out as possible among your opponent's Prizes.

attacks.name: Bitter Reward
attacks.effect: Add a Curse to your opponent's Prizes. Move one of your opponent's Prizes to the Lost Zone. Shuffle your opponent's Prizes.

attacks.name: Vengeful Blow
attacks.effect: Deals 10 more damage for each Prize your opponent has taken.

flavor: Mismagius, the Magical Pokemon, is known for its strange chants. Some cause misery, but some bring happiness.
